mapper.sql: wms_address_real_rela_.id, wms_address_real_rela_.address_code, wms_address_real_rela_.address_name, a.address_type, wms_address_real_rela_.real_address, wms_address_real_rela_.remark, wms_address_real_rela_.user_defined1, wms_address_real_rela_.user_defined2, wms_address_real_rela_.user_defined3, wms_address_real_rela_.user_defined4, wms_address_real_rela_.user_defined5, wms_address_real_rela_.create_by, wms_address_real_rela_.gmt_create, wms_address_real_rela_.last_modified_by, wms_address_real_rela_.gmt_modified, wms_address_real_rela_.active_flag FROM wms_address_real_rela wms_address_real_rela_ LEFT JOIN ( SELECT rela_id, address_type FROM wms_address_transform GROUP BY rela_id , address_type ) a ON wms_address_real_rela_.id = a.rela_id

where 1=1
and wms_address_real_rela_.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.id},'%')
and wms_address_real_rela_.address_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.addressCode},'%')
and wms_address_real_rela_.address_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.addressName},'%')
and a.address_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.addressType},'%')
and wms_address_real_rela_.real_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.realAddress},'%')
and wms_address_real_rela_.remark LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.remark},'%')
and wms_address_real_rela_.user_defined1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined1},'%')
and wms_address_real_rela_.user_defined2 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined2},'%')
and wms_address_real_rela_.user_defined3 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined3},'%')
and wms_address_real_rela_.user_defined4 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined4},'%')
and wms_address_real_rela_.user_defined5 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined5},'%')
and wms_address_real_rela_.create_by LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.createBy},'%')
and wms_address_real_rela_.gmt_create LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.gmtCreate},'%')
and wms_address_real_rela_.last_modified_by LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.lastModifiedBy},'%')
and wms_address_real_rela_.gmt_modified LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.gmtModified},'%')
and wms_address_real_rela_.active_flag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.activeFlag},'%')
mapper.select: wms_address_real_rela wms_address_real_rela_ LEFT JOIN ( SELECT rela_id, address_type FROM wms_address_transform GROUP BY rela_id, address_type ) a ON wms_address_real_rela_.id = a.rela_id
mapper.update:
update wms_address_real_rela
address_code = #{entity.addressCode},
address_name = #{entity.addressName},
real_address = #{entity.realAddress},
remark = #{entity.remark},
user_defined1 = #{entity.userDefined1},
user_defined2 = #{entity.userDefined2},
user_defined3 = #{entity.userDefined3},
user_defined4 = #{entity.userDefined4},
user_defined5 = #{entity.userDefined5},
create_by = #{entity.createBy},
gmt_create = #{entity.gmtCreate},
last_modified_by = #{entity.lastModifiedBy},
gmt_modified = #{entity.gmtModified},
active_flag = #{entity.activeFlag},
where id = #{entity.id}
mapper.select: SELECT wms_address_real_rela_.id, wms_address_real_rela_.address_code, wms_address_real_rela_.address_name, wms_address_real_rela_.real_address, wms_address_real_rela_.remark, wms_address_real_rela_.user_defined1, wms_address_real_rela_.user_defined2, wms_address_real_rela_.user_defined3, wms_address_real_rela_.user_defined4, wms_address_real_rela_.user_defined5, wms_address_real_rela_.create_by, wms_address_real_rela_.gmt_create, wms_address_real_rela_.last_modified_by, wms_address_real_rela_.gmt_modified, wms_address_real_rela_.active_flag FROM wms_address_real_rela wms_address_real_rela_
SELECT t.address_code, t.address_name, t.real_address, s.address_type FROM wms_address_real_rela t JOIN wms_address_transform s ON t.id = s.rela_id WHERE t.address_code = #{entity.addressCode}
